name: Class Test
description: Expect class declarations to define class objects
reason: To check that classes can be defined

name: Class no redefine test
description: Expect classes to not be redefinable
reason: To check classes cannot be redefined

name: Instantiation Test
reason: To check that classes can be instanced

name: Generator Test
description: Expect classes to be instantiable and definable within an upval
reason: To check that classes are useable outside of their upval

name: Variable Test
description: Expect classes to be able to state variables
reason: To check that classes can define variables

name: Method Test
description: Expect classes to be able to state methods
reason: To check that classes can define methodss
